message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate, let's just get it over with!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving up control yet!
You're not giving me a good deal, so I'll give you a slightly worse one. Better take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think this is the end of it!
I'm not desperate, I'm just being cautious. Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're trying to get me to settle, but I'm not there yet. You'll have to do better than that!
Fine, I'll go back to the original split. You can't outmaneuver me, Bob!
